en.text:
I am a {{Java Full Stack Developer}} with over [[4+ years]] of experience building scalable web applications using React.js and Spring Boot.

I have worked extensively on designing RESTful APIs, implementing secure authentication using JWT, optimizing PostgreSQL and SQL Server databases, and migrating legacy systems to modern Spring-based architectures.

At Zemoso Technologies and Centre for Good Governance, I contributed to distributed systems, performance improvements, and scalable backend solutions while also building reusable frontend components using Atomic Design principles and Storybook.

I enjoy solving complex backend problems, improving system performance, and continuously learning new technologies. I look forward to collaborating [[with you!]]

en.title: Software Engineer II (Nov 2024 - Present)
en.text: Designed scalable backend APIs using Spring Boot and MySQL, implemented secure authentication with JWT, and built reusable React components following [[Atomic Design principles]]. Integrated Storybook for better component documentation and testing.

en.title: Software Developer (Aug 2021 - Nov 2024)
en.text: Developed and maintained government web portals using Java, React.js, and Spring Boot. Migrated legacy Struts applications to [[Spring MVC]], improving scalability and performance. Optimized PostgreSQL and SQL Server queries and supported distributed architecture deployments.

en.title: {{Backend Architecture}}
en.text: Learning scalable system design and microservices architecture.

en.title: {{Database Optimization}}
en.text: Improving query performance and database indexing strategies.

en.title: {{DevOps & Docker}}
en.text: Exploring containerization and deployment best practices.

en.title: {{Continuous Learning}}
en.text: Actively learning new technologies and improving problem-solving skills.

en.title: {{Sports & Meditation}}
en.text: Playing volleyball, carrom, and practicing meditation.
